sentences: In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBI/2009/L.13 ), SBI, inter alia, agrees to continue discussions on this issue on the basis of the draft text prepared at SBI 29, previous submissions and documents, the Chair s summary of the roundtable held at SBI 29, and further submissions.

SBI also invites parties and organizations to submit their views on further actions, especially on adverse effects of climate change and the impact of response measures, to be considered at SBI 31 or 32.
SBI also requests its Chair to prepare a draft COP decision with the aim of adopting it at COP 16.
